title: Mourning Sampler, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery with paint on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem stitch on plain weave; hands and faces are painted
description: Mourning picture of two women seated on a bench in a landscape embroidered and painted in pastel colors; some use of chenille yarns. Framed with black eglomisé glass in oval shape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Mourning Sampler, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medium: silk embroidery with paint on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem stitch on plain weave; hands and faces are painted. Gift of Mrs. H.P. Davison. 1974-72-6.
